00024 ManyBodyOperator OpRadiiAll = {
00025  name : "RadiiAll",
00026  rank : 0,
00027  pi : 0,
00028  dim : 5,
00029  size : 5,
00030  par : NULL,
00031  me : calcRadii2allod
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 static void ob_radii2all(const SlaterDet* Q,
00036           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00037           const GaussianAux* X, complex double r2[5])
00038 {
00039   complex double mr2;
00040   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00041 
00042   mr2 = (3.0*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00043  
00044   r2[0] += 1.0/A*(1.0-1.0/A)* mr2;
00045   r2[1] += (1.0/(A*A) + (1+G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/Z-2.0/(A*Z)))* mr2;
00046   r2[2] += (1.0/(A*A) + (1-G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/N-2.0/(A*N)))* mr2;
00047   r2[3] += 1.0/Z*(1.0-1.0/Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2* mr2;
00048   r2[4] += 1.0/N*(1.0-1.0/N)* (1-G1->xi)/2* mr2;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 static void tb_radii2all(const SlaterDet* Q,
00053            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00054            const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00055            const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00056            complex double r2[5])
00057 {       
00058   complex double mr2;
00059   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00060 
00061   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00062 
00063   r2[0] += -2.0/(A*A)* mr2;
00064   r2[1] +=  2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - 
00065                  ((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*Z))* mr2;
00066   r2[2] +=  2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - 
00067                  ((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*N))* mr2;
00068   r2[3] += -2.0/(Z*Z)* (1+G1->xi)/2* (1+G2->xi)/2* mr2;         
00069   r2[4] += -2.0/(N*N)* (1-G1->xi)/2* (1-G2->xi)/2* mr2;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 void calcRadii2all(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00074                    RadiiAll* r2)
00075 {
00076   double r2one[5], r2two[5];
00077   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2 = {dim: 5, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2all};
00078   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_radii2 = {dim: 5, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_radii2all};
00079 
00080 
00081   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_radii2, r2one);
00082   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_radii2, r2two);
00083 
00084   r2->r2m = r2one[0] + r2two[0];
00085   r2->r2p = r2one[1] + r2two[1];
00086   r2->r2n = r2one[2] + r2two[2];
00087   r2->r2pp = r2one[3] + r2two[3];
00088   r2->r2nn = r2one[4] + r2two[4];
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 void calcRadii2allod(void* par,
00093                      const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00094                      const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00095                      RadiiAllod* r2)
00096 {
00097   complex double r2one[5], r2two[5];
00098   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2 = {dim: 5, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2all};
00099   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_radii2 = {dim: 5, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_radii2all};
00100 
00101 
00102   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_radii2, r2one);
00103   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_radii2, r2two);
00104 
00105   r2->r2m = r2one[0] + r2two[0];
00106   r2->r2p = r2one[1] + r2two[1];
00107   r2->r2n = r2one[2] + r2two[2];
00108   r2->r2pp = r2one[3] + r2two[3];
00109   r2->r2nn = r2one[4] + r2two[4];
00110 }

00113 void writeprojectedRadiiAll(FILE* fp,
00114                             const SlaterDet* Q,
00115                             const Projection* P,
00116                             RadiiAllod** radiiall,
00117                             const Eigenstates* E)
00118 {
00119   int odd=P->odd;
00120   int jmax=P->jmax;
00121 
00122   int p,j,i,n;
00123 
00124   char prefix[8];
00125 
00126   RadiiAllod* r;
00127   int* idx;
00128   int ngood;
00129   complex double *norm, *H;
00130 
00131   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00132     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00133       
00134       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00135 
00136       if (ngood) {
00137 
00138         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+');
00139         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+');
00140 
00141         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00142         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00143         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00144 
00145         r = radiiall[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00146   
00147         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  N      = ", prefix);
00148         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00149           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00150         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  H      = ", prefix);
00151         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00152           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00153 
00154         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rm     = ", prefix);
00155         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00156           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2m/norm[idx[i]])));
00157         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rp     = ", prefix);
00158         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00159           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2p/norm[idx[i]])));
00160         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rn     = ", prefix);
00161         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00162           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2n/norm[idx[i]])));
00163         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rch    = ", prefix);
00164         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00165           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(r2charge(creal(r[idx[i]].r2p/norm[idx[i]]), Q->N, Q->Z)));
00166         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rpp    = ", prefix);
00167         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00168           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2pp/norm[idx[i]])));
00169         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rnn    = ", prefix);
00170         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00171           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2nn/norm[idx[i]])));
00172  
00173        fprintf(fp, "\n");
00174       }
00175     }
00176 }
